Do you like shopping on the Internet? I like to buy books online . Usually, the books online aren't _ . You needn't pay  a lot. When I want to know something about a book, I write an e-mail to the online shop for an answer . I am shy . It is not easy for me to talk to the shopkeepers in real  shops.
Sometimes online shops have pictures of the book. They can show you some pages of the book, too. I think this is very _ . I don't like to read books in shops because the shopkeepers may come and talk to me. I don't know _ to say to them.
I can shop at midnight _ I want to. Real shops close at nine o'clock in the evening. Some people may worry that the postman  may damage  the things they _ from online shops, but I don't worry about that.
Some people say that shopping in real shops is good because you can go with your friends and look at many different things. They call this window shopping. I don't have any friends and I don't like to talk too much---it makes me _ .
I am _ my grandmother how to shop online. She cannot walk very far so it will make shopping easy for her if she shops online. My brother _ wants to learn how to do it. He is very busy most of the time. When he has a little free time, he can shop online.
